1.content: So, to get started would you like to make up your own Cyber Hero or use a pre-created one?
1.title: Cyber Hero Call-Recruitment

11.content: Are you a male or female hero?
11.title: Cyber Hero Call-Mobilize

111.content: Do you have superpowers or use high-tech weapons to battle bad guys?
111.title: Male

1111.content: What kind of powers do you have?
1111.title: Superpowers

choices: Listen in to a Police Radio
111111.content:
You are Dead Weight.

You are somewhat over weight as you have a low metabolism. You have left home to travel to New York City to enroll in the Cyber Hero Project.
You were injected with a serum that gives you the ability to manipulate the gravity around you. With your new abilities, you plan to protect the innocent and bring criminals to justice.
111111.title: Dead Weight

choices: Listen in to a Police Radio
111121.content:
You are Solar Flare.

You have been interested in pyrotechnics since a young age. You left home for New York City in hopes of enrolling in the Cyber Hero Project.
You were injected with a serum that gives you the ability to manipulate and generate heat. With your new abilities, you plan to protect the innocent and bring criminals to justice.
111121.title: Solar Flare

112.content: Do you use superpowers or high-tech weapons to battle bad guys?
112.title: Female

choices: Doing some demolition for construction workers at a dock
National Park, playing with the young kids to kill some time
At a bridge, holding in up as repairs are in place.
1122.content:
Chantal Carlonine is a very special 18 year old girl with black/brown hair that has a bit that was cut on the back to split into 2, pale skin, green eyes, a very sexy look with a great looking butt and F cup breast. She is cute and all, but her past had something so tragic that happened to her, that she ended up not being the same ever since.

Okay, let me explain the story to you, she was living in New York City when she was young, and she was victimized to many giant monster attacks that happened over the years in her life at NYC. When she was 10, she moved to Tokyo, only to have a similar fate when the Gorizilla (Godzilla parody) attack happen, then moved back again, but here is the most tragic part of it all. One day, she was running from a giant monster attack when her parents got killed in a train accident that was caused by the monster, somehow… when the monster got defeated by the superhero that everyone known and loved (you know the name anyway, so why bother telling you), it was too late. Chantal somehow got on fire and got seriously burned from the monster’s flames, and she was taken to the hospital.

With injuries this drastic, the Cyber Hero Project took her in as their newest hero, Since some monsters love their huge size, perhaps they need to make her huge as well… so they have created the M295X, a full 150ft tall battle mech that would be equipped with tons of weaponry and gadgetry that would counter off those monsters and help the city that they never could imagined. They knew that in order for it to work though, someone will have to take the armor itself, and merge it into their own, and Chantal was that person since her injuries were so bad, this was the only way to save her life. Chantal’s brain was removed from her old dying body, and was inserted into the robot as its new master programmer, and controller. When this happened, the robot turned into a version of Chantal Carlonine. Same sexy look, but now is armed and dangerous.

Chantal knew that the monster took her parents, and she vowed that she would defend New York City with her life with this new mech that she is now bonded with. She might be huge, and deadly… but she is still the same caring self, and would protect the city with the heroes and the government.

Ever since she came in, she became the heavy guns, the brute force, the supporter that everyone wanted, and the government got tons of respect because of her. Her new look now reflect a power armor suit that shows most of her skin, but uses a pinkish bikini suit armor to hide the private parts, and she has gain a lot of attention as a result, not to mention her weapons and her vicious roar that could shatter many into terror if used wrong, etc. Also, with new tech developed by Cyber Hero - Macro, she can now vary her height and weight. So she can be normal sized or bigger than the Empire State Building.

The Project taught her how to use this new armor, and how it now bonds with her as of this day, and ever since… she was doing jobs for the city that she can do. She does demolition when needed, she also does construction, monster fighting, security for certain events, city watcher, modeling, etc. She became the reason to enroll for many, for others… it’s just to see this girl. They called her Giga Mecha Chantal.

/

Somewhere in NYC, Chantal was last seen….?
1122.title: Turned into a Mega-Sized Robot Girl

choices: Modeling Job, as you are sexy, and prehaps you would really like to be a star
Demolition Job, an Old dock is going to go as we are going to build you a house
11222.content:
Recently, Chantal was spotted at National Park, where many of the kids were just coming up and jumping up and down on her, as they really love her. Chantal was glad that she had such fans, especially in the young boys and girls as everyone seems to be in love with her.

Okay, now here is a backstory on her success, her actions on taking out monsters, watching the city, etc… has earned her a lot of success… heck… Japan made an anime cartoon out of her, and she was a real fanbase there, and in America as well. Everyone like the fact that a young sexy 18 year old cute girl is turned into a 150ft kaiju fighting mech with tons of weaponry and such a cute and caring personality. Everyone basically knows her identity… and its Chantal, but the kids refer her as Mecha Girl, and Chantal really like that name, and would continue to fight for the kids of all ages.

Her publicity even went into a motion picture itself, a novel of her success, coloring books, theme parks, video games, comics, etc…. and she was by far loved even more than Vertigo, or any of the other superheroes you might say like Spider-Man, Capitan America, X-Men, Hulk, etc. Sooner or later, she simply became the reason to come to NYC itself, to experience Mecha Girl in all of her beauty, and her amazing size.

Chantal was playing with the many kids at the park as she has nothing that big to do at this moment as the government gave her a break after doing a lot of things, then suddenly a man shows up to see Chantal, and the kids left as they needed to get going, and Chantal can do anything, and thankfully the man in suits was not a criminal or terrorist at all, so at least it’s okay.

“Chantal… or should I say… Mecha Girl.” said by the man in the suit as he got to see Chantal. “It seems you are loved by all the kids in NYC and around the world, and how you are by far the most famous person in the world.”

“That is true, everyone basically came to NYC for me ever since I became a huge star, do you have anything for me?” Chantal asked.

“Exactly, you see, I got a job for you, and you are going to like the job.” The man said.

“What is it?” Chantal asked.
11222.title: Loved by the World

12.content: Are you a male or female hero?
12.title: Cyber Hero Call-Mobilize

14.content:
Which hero would you like to use? Here are some options:

Freezer: Real Name: Francis Drake. Height:5',8". Weight: 120 lbs. Eyes: Black. Hair: White. Powers: can generate beams of intense cold

Coroid: Real Name: Blake Edwards. Height: 7',6" (armored). Weight: 260 lbs (armored). Hair: Blond. Eyes: Brown. Armor Capabilities: Super strength, Invulnerability, Energy weapons

Dragonman: Real Name: Joseph Stryz. Height: 6',4". Weight: 160 lbs. Hair: Black. Eyes: Black. Powers: Can generate flames Armor Capabilities: Wings, Talons, Enhanced vision

Nitewing: Real Name: Joshua Penz. Height: 6',8". Weight: 230 lbs. Hair: Bleached. Eyes: Green. Armor Capabilities: Wings, Talons, Shadow camouflage

Wyvern: Real Name: Mya Stryz. Height: 5',8". Weight: 110 lbs. Hair: Blond. Eyes: Blue. Powers: Short-range energy blasts. Armor Capabilities: Wings, Talons
14.title: Cyber Hero Call-Energize

15.content:
Blazer: Real Name: Samuel Braze. Height: 5',10". Weight: 170 lbs. Hair: Black. Eyes: Blue. Powers: Flight, Heat & flame manipulation

Laserman: Real Name: Raymond Dennings. Height: 6',3". Weight: 200 lbs. Hair: Red. Eyes: Yellow. Armor Capabilities: Laser cannons, super strength

Matrix: Real Name: Jesse Ferrara. Height: 5',7". Weight: 140 lbs. Hair: Black. Eyes: Green. Powers: Magnetism

Wingman: Real Name: Scott Allistar. Height: 6',1". Weight: 200 lbs. Hair: Brown. Eyes: Brown. Armor Capabilities:Wings, arm-mounted blades, laser diamond

Whirlwind: Real Name: Penny Raine. Height: 5',11". Weight: 180 lbs. Hair: Blond. Eyes: Hazel. Powers: Atmospheric manipulaton
15.title: Cyber Hero Call-Energize

153.content:
"Aw, come on Dad, let me go!" I knew the words weren't going to do any good, but I said them anyway. "You let Neo go out and he's the same age as me. Why can't I go with you?"

My dad didn't even blink. Or maybe he did, it's kind of hard to tell with his mask on. My dad's name is Vincent Ferarra, but the world knows him as Vertigo, the leader of the Cyber Heroes. And when your dad has that kind of power, people look at you and compare you to him. Physically, we're almost twins. Same spiked black hair, same green eyes, same pale skin. But I'm nowhere near the kind of hero he is. He can move mountains with one hand, and what can I do? I can make metal sit up and beg. My suit amplifies that, and then I'm one of the most powerful people on the planet. So why does he insist on treating me like a kid?

"You don't have the experience necessary to handle a fight like this. You're staying here and that's final. Now report to Dragonman for your training."

As he turned around and left, the coils on my suit heated up and discharged a burst of lightning as I fumed. Then I thought, since when do I listen to what he says?I'll just round up some of my boys and follow him.
153.title: Matrix

choices: Dragonman shows up and stops their plans
1531.content:
I tapped the com-link in my ear as I ran down the hallway. "Delta Squad, meet me in the commissionairy."

A few minutes later, I met my squad. Neo, Brawler, and Wyvern were all sitting at a table in the middle of H.Q.'s cafeteria. Brawler stood up and saluted.

"Come on, man, I'm not your commandant. Sit down." He sat down and I said, "How would you guys like to go on a real mission for once in your life?"

Neo pounded the table. "Hell, yeah! When do we leave?"

"As soon as I can get a ship prepped." Wyvern raised her hand. "Yes, Mya?"

"What is the mission?"

"Well...ah..I" I stuttered. "I don't really know. We're not really supposed to be going."

Wyvern rolled her eyes. "Not more of this macho competitive stuff. Your father really trusts you, why can't you see that?"

"All right, I'll prove to you my dad does not trust me. The minute I show up, he'll start chewing me out." I put my hands on the table and leaned forward. "So is it a bet?"
1531.title: Cyber Hero Call-Rebellion

15311.content: "You're on, Jesse. And just to make it interesting..." She trailed off, trying to think up an appropriate wager. Neo scratched his head, then leaped up. "I got it! Loser has to.."
15311.title: I'll take that bet

153111.content:
"... buy the loser lunch after the mission!"

"That's a good one, Neo." I said. "Well, let's get going, people." We stood up and ran to the hanger, where our ships are. When we got there, I used my armor to hack into the main computer to see where my dad went. After I had the coordinates, I looked up at my teammates and said...
153111.title: Chow down

choices: The Cyber Heroes in a fight
1531111.content: "These coordinates are right up the street! We can be there in five minutes!" I pressed the open button and the hanger door dropped open. We jumped out and started the trip. Wyvern used her wings, Neo flew, Brawler jumped from building to building, and I used a pair of hover-skates I designed. We were on the scene in five minutes to find...
1531111.title: Just a half mile away

choices: He landed a hit on the green guy
15311112.content:
Coroid was getting slammed by a dude that looked half-human and half...something else. A couple of yards away, a huge green guy was giving Anaheim and Manhattan a whooping, too. I looked around wildly to try and spot my dad. I found him laying unconscious in a pile of rubble. This made me a lot more cautious. If these guys were powerful enough to beat my dad, they were no pushovers.

"Brawler!" I yelled. "Distract them with Net of Bodies! We'll back you up! Delta Squad move!"

Brawler leaped up into the air and suddenly, dozens of other Brawlers appeared in midair.

The Net of Bodies Technique is Brawler's specialty. He does it by moving at super-speed to several different positions, making it look like there's more than one of him.

Brawler(s) jumped forward and prepared to attack the enemies. As we ran after him...
15311112.title: Cyber Hero Call-Combat

1533.content: "Nah." I said to myself. "I'll just head out and goof off. Maybe try Wyvern for a date." I mentally retracted my armor, revealing my street clothes. As I headed to the elevator, I debated where I should go. "I got it. I'll head for..."
1533.title: Stepping out

15331.content: I stepped off the subway and headed up top to see the dazzling lights of the Rockafeller Plaza Christmas tree. When I walked down the steps to the rink, I saw Scott Allistar and his fiancee Penny Raine sitting in the restaurant. I walked over and said, "Hey, guys. How's my favorite Cyber Hero couple hanging?" (Scott is Cyber Hero-Wingman and Penny is Cyber Hero-Whirlwind.) "Hey Jesse. What brings you here?" asked Scott. "Nothing. Just decided to practice my skating." "Well don't let us keep you," said Penny. "All right, I'm off. You lovebirds have a nice night, hear?" I skated away, barely keeping my balance. As I flopped around the ice, I mentally keyed in the tracking program in my suit. It lets me track a Cyber Hero's ID card and communicator, telling me exactly where they are. I pulled Wyvern's data up and let the program do its thing. A second later, it told me Wyvern was right behind the statue of Prometheus. I skated around, ready to dazzle Mya with my sparkling wit... That is, until my breath caught in my throat. Mya was behind the statue, all right. She was also making out with another girl. For a second I didn't know what to do.
15331.title: Rockafeller Plaza

choices: A guy in a costume that looks like mine
153312.content: I couldn't bear the sight any longer. I turned around and bolted. I don't know how far I actually got, but it seemed like I'd been running for ages when a fireball shot into the pavement in front of me. I barely managed to avoid falling in the crater. I turned around, suit folding out, ready to bust a guy's head in. The smoke wafted away, revealing...
153312.title: Run, run, run...

1533122.content:
The guy's suit looked a lot like mine. Only instead of black and violet, his was red and white. The flames around his hands and his smug expresion told me he was the one who attacked me. "So who are you? Some sort of doppelganger?" I asked. He just smiled and said, "The name's Helix. And you're the copy, dreg."
I used my magnetic powers to grab a dumpster and hurl it at him. At the last second, he shot another fireball, knocking the dumpster away from him. "Don't you know anything, dreg?" Helix sneered. "Magnetism is repelled by extreme heat. Which means you're about to be flash-fried." Another, bigger fireball soared at me. I pulled some metal debris over me as a shield. After the heat was off, I stood up, facing Helix down. "And what do you mean I'm the copy?" I asked. Helix laughed and began radiating fire. "My powers perfectly counter yours. Your father was Vertigo, so who do you think mine is?"
I stared at him in disbelief. "But... Velocity never had a son!" I yelled. (Velocity is my dad's "evil twin" from some alternate dimension.) "He did, and I'm him. Now get ready to be cooked." A massive fireball came hurtling at me. I almost didn't have enough time to react...
1533122.title: Enter: Cyber Criminal- Helix

choices: The distress signal draws other heroes to the scene
15331222.content:
The flames crashed into me, hurling me into a brick wall. The heat was cooking the systems in my suit. Soon I wasn't going to have enough power to move a manhole cover. Helix was standing over me arrogantly, flames crackling over his suit. "So what," I coughed, "you're just Daddy's little errand boy now? Here to get to him through me?" Helix chuckled. "Please. Velocity's just a washed up joke now. Sure, he might have been hot shit once, but now he's just a senile old fool. Me, I signed up with the winning team."

As he spoke, a strange hovercraft flew into view. A rope ladder dropped from the side, carrying a malevolently familiar figure. "Night Terror." The words caught in my throat. Night Terror was one of the most diabolical criminals the Cyber Heroes have ever gone up against. His goal was to unite the entire metahuman criminal population under his command. He already boasted a formidable arsenal of villains, such as Waterspout, Storm Lasher, and Shadra. If Helix was working for him, the heroes were in serious trouble. I mentally triggered the distress beacon in my armor. Within minutes, this block would be swarming with heroes.

Night Terror hit the pavement and studied me like an ant under a magnifying glass. "You are Vertigo's son?" he asked in surprise. "I expected someone more... powerful." I struggled to get to my feet. "Hey, do I insult your kids?" The bravado was going to get me killed. The power enhancers in my suit were dead and my natural powers were nowhere near strong enough to take on Night Terror and his goons. I didn't even put up a fight when he grabbed me and said "You're coming with us."
15331222.title: Fear the darkness

info.brief_description: Futuristic heroes protect Earth with amazing technology. Please add.
info.description:
In the year 2026, a man named Vincent Ferrara will use his powers of energy manipulation to become the super hero Vertigo and his genius mind to grant his friends with technology-based powers. Eventually, this will become the cornerstone for the Cyber Hero project. Men and women from all over the world come to the Cyberscraper in New York City to enroll. Now you can be a Cyber Hero too! Use either cutting-edge tech or superpowers to defend the world. And remember, "The strongest hero is not the one who can punch his way through anything, but the one who can win a battle without throwing a single punch."

Rules: If you make your own hero, leave an option that lets someone else make their own.

I reserve the right to edit all entries to fit into the continuity of the overall storyline.

For future reference: The Cyberscraper is the Cyber Hero Project's base and headquarters, not an institution for cranking out heroes.
